approaches.title: Use If Statements
approaches.blurb: Use if-statements to check scoring boundaries for a dart throw.

approaches.title: Use a Tuple & Loop through Scores
approaches.blurb: Score the Dart throw by looping through a tuple of scores.

approaches.title: Use Structural Pattern Matching ('Match-Case')
approaches.blurb: Use a Match-Case (Structural Pattern Matching) to score the dart throw.)

approaches.title: Use a Dictionary with a Generator Expression
approaches.blurb: Use a generator expression looping over a scoring dictionary, getting the max score for the dart throw.

approaches.title: Use Boolean Values as Integers
approaches.blurb: Use True and False as integer values to calculate the score of the dart throw.

approaches.title: Use a Dictionary with dict.get
approaches.blurb: Loop over a dictionary and retrieve score via dct.get.
